title: in dev mode logs are frozen when a BuildStep is blocking
body:
### Describe the bug

in dev mode, if the process gets longer (slow connection) it waits for as long as the download to show the logs:
![image](https://quarkusio.zulipchat.com/user_uploads/11321/Yd6AVaNvDbLaJ546NqqvVFo8/Kapture-2023-09-22-at-09.01.32.gif)

As a user it feels like a freeze if it gets longer.

in build, the logs are flowing making the download feels ok:
![image](https://quarkusio.zulipchat.com/user_uploads/11321/5N6oOKrmUWwE9RooNkSFaNyA/Kapture-2023-09-22-at-09.06.10.gif)


### Expected behavior

The logs should flow in both mode

### Actual behavior

it freezes

### How to Reproduce?

https://github.com/ia3andy/reproducer-slow-logs

you need to delete the .quinoa dir because it is what gets downloaded and show the logs slowness issue

```bash
rm -rf .quinoa
quarkus dev
```
